QA: vitani agrees with kiara
kiara kept on failing
should ve been the chosen one
wise king once told me we are one
he tries to free pumbaa as the lioness draws closer
the outsiders realize kiara is correct but zira ignores her
as mufasa nears the top he sees scar standing over him
hearing pumbaa timon comes running and finds him stuck in the roots of tree
zazu mutters under his breath that he never had to do this under mufasa
timon takes ma uncle max and the meerkat colony to live in the jungle realizing his true hakuna matata is family
mufasa and his majordomo hornbill named zazu rowan atkinson confront scar on why he wasn present at the ceremony that morning
timon shows pumbaa his backstory revealing him to be an outcast in his meerkat colony on the outskirts of the pridelands
meanwhile as thunderstorm struck the pride lands zira leads her pride in war against the pride lands and fierce fight breaks out
lightning strikes and ignites fire beneath him as scar looks over him remarking that this was just the way mufasa looked before he died
unmoved by her insight zira wickedly tells her daughter that she will die too if she will not fight which turns the other outlanders against her
pumbaa asks what the sparkling lights in the sky are to which timon replies that they re fireflies that got stuck in the big bluish black thing
the film is told through the perspectives of timon and pumbaa who watch their side of the lion king in cinema occasionally stopping the footage to talk with one another
simba allows the outlanders including kovu to return to the pride lands and kovu is allowed to stand with kiara at the top of pride rock with mufasa proudly proclaiming we are one

they are eventually caught in the wildebeest stampede that takes the life of mufasa but survive and find vast jungle which they decide to make their home timon learning of pumbaa own philosophy of hakuna matata embracing it to his fullest

rafiki appears to timon and reminds him that his hakuna matata is not home but friendship prompting timon to go after his friends at pride rock timon and pumbaa evade the hyenas but run into ma and uncle max who came looking for timon
